item.title: Building tequilaOS
item.description: Today I will show you how to build tequilaOS ðŸ†’ First Initializing the tequilaOS repo and downloading the manifest repo init -u https://github.com/tequilaOS/platform_manifest.git -b tobacco If you want to download only last commit add --depth=1 Sync code aka download meh way repo sync cool way #faster and better repo sync build/make vendor/tequila && source build/envsetup.sh && reposync Buil[t/d]ing # Set up environment . build/envsetup.sh # Choose a target lunch tequila_$device-user # userdebug is for losers # Build the code mka bacon Proper docs This is no junk rom with a stick up its ass.
